author: Special Correspondent
text:
Due to line block to facilitate engineering works on Chennai Beach – Velachery MRTS section, a few services have been cancelled in the afternoon on January 23 and 24 and also on January 30 and 31.

A press release said trains leaving Beach for Velachery at 11 a.m., 11.15 a.m., 11.30 a.m., 11.45 a.m., 12.05 p.m., 12.25 p.m., 12.45 p.m., 1.05 p.m., 1.25 and 1.45 p.m. on January 23 and 30 have been cancelled.

From Velachery, trains leaving for Beach at 11.20 a.m., 11.35 a.m., 11.55 a.m., 12.15 p.m., 12.35 p.m., 12.55 p.m. and 1.15 have also been cancelled on the same days.

On January 24 and 31, trains leaving Beach for Velachery at 11 a.m., 11.20 a.m., 11.40 a.m., 12.00 p.m., 12.20 p.m., 12.40, 1 p.m., 1.20 p.m., 1.40 have been cancelled. On the same days, services leaving Velachery for Chennai Beach at 11 a.m., 11.30 a.m., 11.50 a.m., 12.10 p.m., 12.30 p.m., 12.50 p.m. and 1.10 p.m. have also been cancelled. Commuters can also check Southern Railways website:www.sr.indianrailways.gov.inand follow twitter handles @GMSouthernrailway and @DrmChennai for updates.
title: MRTS services cancelled
